sentences.sContent: I’ll show you to your room. Ours is next door.
sentences.sCn: 我带你去你的房间，我们的房间在你的隔壁。

sentences.sContent: The main difference between our brains and those of monkeys is that ours are bigger.
sentences.sCn: 我们的大脑和猴子的大脑之间的主要差别在于我们的要大些。

trans.tranOther: used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with us
